content:
With this, their second single, Manchester dark-pop outfit NO CEREMONY raise the bar, with two tracks that are as twisted as they are beautiful.

A-Side HEARTBREAKER is a synth driven monster, conjuring up an atmosphere that is both menacing and intensely addictive. On the flip-side BREAKHEARTS is a more dance orientated affair, equally tenebrous, relying upon pitch-shifted vocals to add an extra dimension to the track. Think Metronomy heard through the ears of a serial killer. Check out both tracks below, and grab a free download of HEARTBREAKER.
